name: Jyrki Pinomaa
title: President
copy: Jyrki Pinomaa is the President of Inclusion Europe. Jyrki has two sons with severe disabilities. Jyrki had been the president for Inclusion Finland, and worked for an association providing housing and services to people with intellectual disabilities.

name: László Bercse
title: Vice-President
copy: László Bercse is the Vice-President of Inclusion Europe, and chair of the European Platform of Self-Advocates. László is also the co-chair of EFOESZ, Hungary.

name: Mateja de Reya
title: Vice-President
copy: Mateja de Reya is the Vice-President of Inclusion Europe representing family members. Mateja is also the director of Zveza Sozitje, Slovenia.

name: Guillaume Jacquinot
title: Secretary-General
copy: Guillaume Jacquinot is a brother to his sister with intellectual disabilities. Guillaume was nominated to the Board by Inclusion Ireland.

name: Jeanne Nicklas-Faust
title: Treasurer
copy: Jeanne Nicklas-Faust is a mother of her daughter with intellectual disabiliteis. Jeanne is also Secretary-General of Lebenshilfe, Germany.

name: Cristina Schiratti
title: Board Member
copy: Cristina Schiratti, a mother to her daughter with intellectual disabilities. Board member of Anffas, Italy.

name: Dana Migaliova
title: Board Member
copy: Dana Migaliova, a mother to her son with intellectual disabilities. President of Viltis, Lithuania.

name: Oswald Föllerer
title: Board Member
copy: Oswald Föllerer, self-advocate with Self-Advocacy Centre in Vienna, Austria.

name: Tania Damianova-Sabir
title: Board Member
copy: Tania Damianova-Sabir, a mother to her daughter with disabilities. Co-opted Board member.

name: Milan Šveřepa
title: Director
copy: Milan Šveřepa is director of Inclusion Europe. Before joining Inclusion Europe Milan worked on deinstitutionalisation in Czechia and in other countries in Central and Eastern Europe.

name: Soufiane El Amrani
title: Self-Advocate and Accessibility Expert
copy: Soufiane El Amrani is self-advocate, and accessibility expert of Inclusion Europe. Soufiane has been working with the European Platform of Self-Advocates for many years. Soufiane is at Council of Inclusion International since November 2020.

name: Freddy Jussien
title: Advocacy Lead
copy: Freddy Jussien is advocacy lead of Inclusion Europe. Before starting at Inclusion Europe, Freddy used to work at European Association of Service Providers for Persons with Disabilities.

name: Sandra Marques
title: Self-Advocacy Expert
copy: Sandra Marques is the self-advocacy expert of Inclusion Europe. Sandra supports the European Platform of Self-Advocates.

name: Inge Volleberg
title: Coordinator and Researcher
copy: Inge Volleberg is coordinator and researcher, responsible for Inclusion indicators reports.

name: Helena Lambsdorff
title: Coordinator
copy: Helena Lambsdorff is communication officer. Helena is also the coordinator of the EEG (coordinator@deinstitutionalisation.com).

name: Nina Vertot
title: Finance Officer
copy: Nina Vertot is finance officer of Inclusion Europe.
